mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(member_id, post_id, content, parent_id, depth) VALUES (#{comment.memberId}, #{postId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.parentId}, #{depth})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS commentId, m.nickname, c.content, c.created_at, c.modified_at, c.member_id, c.is_deleted,c.parent_id, c.depth, CASE WHEN c.created_at != c.modified_at THEN true ELSE false END AS isEdited FROM comments c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.parent_id IS NULL THEN c.created_at ELSE c.parent_id END, COALESCE(c.parent_id, c.id), c.created_at
